original_text: Then said the princes and all the people unto the priests and to the prophets; This man is not worthy to die: for he hath spoken to us in the name of the Lord our God.
korean_text: 고관들과 모든 백성이 제사장들과 선지자들에게 이르되 이 사람이 우리 하나님 여호와의 이름으로 우리에게 말하였으니 죽일 만한 이유가 없느니라

sentences.original_text: Then said princes and all the people
unto priests and to the prophets
This man is not worthy to die
for he hath spoken to us
in the name of the Lord our God
